ModulePrefs.title: FOTWORLD+Twitter-Profile
ModulePrefs.description: This is the gadget of FOTWORLD+Î±. Display tweets by @FOTWORLD.
ModulePrefs.author: Yuji DOI

Module.Content:
<script charset="utf-8" src="http://widgets.twimg.com/j/2/widget.js"></script>
<script>
new TWTR.Widget({
  version: 2,
  type: 'profile',
  rpp: 4,
  interval: 30000,
  width: 'auto',
  height: 300,
  theme: {
    shell: {
      background: '#ffa600',
      color: '#ffffff'
    },
    tweets: {
      background: '#ffffff',
      color: '#000000',
      links: '#228b22'
    }
  },
  features: {
    scrollbar: true,
    loop: false,
    live: true,
    behavior: 'all'
  }
}).render().setUser('FOTWORLD').start();
</script>
